src:
英語民間試験、２０年度からの実施延期を表明…文科相

01 Nov 2019, 00:45

　萩生田文科相は１日午前の記者会見で、大学入学共通テストでの英語民間試験の活用について、２０２０年度からの実施を延期すると発表した。
text:
Announcement of postponement of English private exam from FY20 ... Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology

01 Nov 2019, 00:45

文 At the press conference on the morning of 1st, Ms. Shibuya announced that she would postpone the implementation of the English private examination for the university entrance examination from FY2020.
